fields.fieldTitle: Type of webinar:

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: New, Free, Premium, Members-Only, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Title of Webinar

fieldHint.hint1: (Ex: Automatic Autoresponder Marketing)

fieldHint.hint2: TIP: Use the Profitable Title Scripts to come up with great webinar title ideas

fields.fieldTitle: Tagline of the webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to put your email marketing on auto-pilot!

fields.fieldTitle: Your Name

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Jim Edwards

fields.fieldTitle: Topic of the webinar in 2-3 words

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Automatic Email Marketing

fields.fieldTitle: Webinar Date

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Thursday, Dec. 24, 2024

fields.fieldTitle: Webinar Time

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 7:00 p.m. Eastern

fields.fieldTitle: What's the top problem they face in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to get your email marketing set up to run automatically

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 thing they want to know how to do in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: The specific mechanics of setting up an automatic email autoresponder campaign

fields.fieldTitle: What's their #1 fear they want to avoid at all costs?

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB ending in "ING"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Getting stuck with all the complicated technical details of setting things up

fields.fieldTitle: "Big Picture" Payoff of the webinar (How To)

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a "How to"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to set your email marketing on auto-pilot AND on steroids at the same time

fields.fieldTitle: #1 Big Benefit of being on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build a free or paid newsletter to increase your sales

fields.fieldTitle: #2 Big Benefit of being on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build a big, profitable email list

fields.fieldTitle: #3 Big Benefit of being on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: increase your "stick rate" on sales on everything from big-ticket items to even the humblest "ebook!"

fields.fieldTitle: Cool "how to" secret you'll drop on them in webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a "How to"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to turn an autoresponder into a monthly cash-flow source by creating a "Simple, Sequential Membership Site!"

fields.fieldTitle: First Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: What is an autoresponder? How do they work?

fields.fieldTitle: Second Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How do I set up email autoresponder?

fields.fieldTitle: Third Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Where can I find an autoresponder that does not require a confirmation email?

fields.fieldTitle: Fourth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How do I use an autoresponder to work on my free or paid newsletter?

fields.fieldTitle: Fifth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How do I turn an autoresponder into a simple, paid membership site?

fields.fieldTitle: Sixth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Is there an inexpensive autoresponder that will allow me to import leads from a csv or text file?

fields.fieldTitle: Seventh Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How do you set up an autoresponder for an offline busines?

fields.fieldTitle: Eighth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Where do I find an autoresponder for instanty sending a file?

fields.fieldTitle: Ninth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: What is the best way to build a relationship with my autoresponder list?

fields.fieldTitle: Tenth Question / tip / trick / secret answered on webinar

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Can I attach an autoresponder to Contact #7 form on my wordpress site?

fields.fieldTitle: Specific, tangible payoff wanted & can expect from webinar?

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: put your marketing on true "auto-pilot" once and for all... no matter WHAT you sell or WHO you sell it to
